0.0: ATK is increased by <cryo>12%</cryo>. When current HP increases or decreases, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>14%</cryo>, and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> for 4s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the equipping character possesses 3 stacks, ATK SPD will be increased by <cryo>8%</cryo>.
